sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { CSidebar, CSidebarBrand, CSidebarNav } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import { sygnet } from '../assets/brand/sygnet' import { AppSidebarNav } from './sidebar/AppSidebarNav' import items from '../utils/sidebarnav' const AppSidebar = () => { const sidebarShow = useSelector((state) => state.sidebarShow) return ( ) } export default React.memo(AppSidebar)
